title: Enhancing CS Practical Competencies: Impact of Background Music on Learning Retention—Multimedia Education Approach

context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three key research findings explaining the impact of background music on learning retention.
Learners can design background music application strategies for educational video production, categorized by learning stages (pre-training/main content).
Learners can write reports evaluating the effects of background music by applying experimental design and result interpretation methods.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
